DOC.detailed_description: The aim present study test efficacy comprehensive community disease management program patient unstable chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) asthma . The intervention deliver designated nurse pulmonologists , collaboration primary practitioner healthcare professional community , Jerusalem Lowland District Maccabi Health Services Israel . The main purpose evaluate effect intervention use acute care emergency health service acute exacerbation lung disease . Secondary objective include evaluation effect intervention quality life , physical function , pulmonary function test , depression all-cause mortality .
